summary.span: 作為所有資料控制項欄位類型的基底類別，代表表格式資料繫結控制項中資料的資料行，例如 和 。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all data control field types, which represent a column of data in tabular data-bound controls such as and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別作為基底類別的所有資料控制項欄位類型。The class serves as the base class for all data control field types. 用來表示欄位的資料，類似的資料繫結控制項的資料控制項欄位物件都代表一種資料行中控制項。Data control fields are used by data-bound controls to represent a field of data, similar to how a object represents a type of column in the control. 使用衍生自類別來控制資料的欄位的顯示方式在資料繫結控制項中這類或。Use the classes that are derived from to control how a field of data is displayed in a data-bound control such as or . 下表列出 ASP.NET 所提供的不同資料控制項欄位類型。The following table lists the different data control field types provided by ASP.NET. |資料行欄位類型Column field type|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| ||資料來源中的欄位值顯示為文字中。Displays the value of a field in a data source as text.| ||資料繫結控制項中顯示命令按鈕。Displays a command button in a data-bound control. 依據控制項，這可讓您顯示一個資料列或資料行與自訂的按鈕控制項，例如新增或移除按鈕。Depending on the control, this allows you to display either a row or a column with a custom button control, such as an Add or a Remove button.| ||顯示資料繫結控制項中的核取方塊。Displays a check box in a data-bound control. 這個資料欄位型別通常用於顯示的布林值的欄位。This data control field type is commonly used to display fields with a Boolean value.| ||顯示內建的命令按鈕，以執行編輯、 插入或刪除的資料繫結控制項中的作業。Displays built-in command buttons to perform edit, insert, or delete operations in a data-bound control.| ||資料來源中的欄位的值顯示為超連結。Displays the value of a field in a data source as a hyperlink. 這個資料欄位型別可讓您的第二個欄位繫結至超連結的 URL。This data control field type allows you to bind a second field to the hyperlink's URL.| ||資料繫結控制項中顯示影像。Displays an image in a data-bound control.| ||顯示使用者定義內容根據指定的範本資料繫結控制項中。Displays user-defined content in a data-bound control according to a specified template.| 您也可以擴充和類別來建立您自己的資料控制項欄位類型。You can also extend the and classes to create your own data control field types. 類別提供許多屬性，判斷使用者介面 (UI) 項目中的資料繫結控制項的呈現方式。The class provides many properties that determine how user interface (UI) elements are presented in the data-bound control. 並非每個控制項呈現 UI 時，會使用每個可用的資料控制項欄位的屬性。Not every control uses every available data control field property when rendering a UI. 比方說，控制項，為資料列中顯示的資料控制項欄位，包括每個資料控制項欄位的標頭項目，但沒有頁尾項目。For example, the control, which displays the data control fields as rows, includes a header item for each data control field, but no footer item. 因此，並屬性會忽略控制項。Therefore, the and properties are ignored by the control. 控制項，不過，使用並屬性如果屬性設定為`true`。The control, however, uses the and properties if the property is set to `true`. 同樣地，資料控制項欄位屬性會影響 UI 項目，根據元素的呈現方式。Similarly, the data control field properties affect the presentation of UI elements depending on what the element is. 屬性一律會套用至欄位。The property is always applied to the field. 如果型別衍生自包含一個控制項，如同或類別，屬性套用至欄位。If the type derived from contains a control, as in the or classes, the property is applied to the field. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用並物件，衍生自，用來顯示中的資料列控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use and objects, which are derived from , to display rows in a control. 控制項有屬性設定為`false`，可顯示所傳回的資料子集屬性。The control has the property set to `false`, which enables it to display a subset of the data returned by the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_1/CS/datacontrolfield1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_1/VB/datacontrolfield1vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充類別來建立可用於自訂繫結的欄位控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to extend the class to create a custom bound field that can be used in a control. 類似於類別，`RadioButtonField`類別表示的資料行`true`或`false`資料。Similar to the class, the `RadioButtonField` class represents a column of `true` or `false` data. 不過，雖然資料的類別的繫結至可以是任何一組`true`或`false`值，資料集，`RadioButtonField`類別會繫結至只能有一個`true`在任何指定時間的值。However, although the data that the class is bound to can be any set of `true` or `false` values, the set of data that the `RadioButtonField` class is bound to can have only one `true` value at any given time. 此範例示範如何實作並方法、 兩個重要的方法，所有的類別衍生自。This example demonstrates how to implement the and methods, two important methods of all classes derived from . [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField/CS/radiobuttonfield.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField/VB/radiobuttonfield.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用`RadioButtonField`類別，後者在前一個範例中，提供在控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the `RadioButtonField` class, which is provided in the previous example, in a control. 在此範例中，控制項會顯示運動小組的資料。In this example, the control displays data for a sports team. 資料表中的資料，其中包含識別碼資料行，播放程式名稱 中的資料行，則為 true 或 false 的資料行可識別小組的 captain 維護玩家資料。The player data is maintained in a data table that includes an ID column, columns for the player names, and a true or false column that identifies the captain of the team. `RadioButtonField`類別用來顯示哪一個小組成員是目前的小組 captain。The `RadioButtonField` class is used to display which team member is the current team captain. 可以編輯控制項，以選擇新的小組 captain 或變更其他播放器資訊。The control can be edited to choose a new team captain or to change other player information. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_4/CS/datacontrolfield4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_4/VB/datacontrolfield4vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為類別是抽象的您無法建立直接物件。Because the class is abstract, you cannot create a object directly. 這個建構函式來初始化中定義的屬性衍生類別的建構函式通常稱為類別。This constructor is commonly called by the constructor of a derived class to initialize the properties defined in the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會呼叫方法以引發狀態變更事件時屬性設定。The method is called to raise a state change event when the property is set. 值屬性儲存在檢視狀態。The value of the property is stored in view state. 此屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

summary.span: 取得 物件內含之任何 Web 伺服器控制項的樣式。

value.span: ，管理欄位包含之 Web 伺服器控制項的外觀。

span.span: A that governs the appearance of Web server controls contained by the field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會管理任何衍生自型別所包含的 Web 伺服器控制項的外觀。The property governs the appearance of any Web server controls contained by types derived from . 這個屬性不會影響所有衍生型別。This property does not affect all derived types. 控制項，這通常顯示的文字資料，並且只包含控制項，只會受到屬性中狀態。The control, which typically displays text data and contains only controls, is only affected by the property when in state. 例如 web 伺服器控制項並可能會受到屬性，視控制項的物件執行個體欄位包含特定的組態而定。Web server controls such as and might be affected by the property, depending on the specific configuration of the control object instances contained by the field. 例如，控制項可以轉譯成， ，或物件。For example, the control can be rendered as a , , or object. 雖然控制受到`font`屬性指定的物件，控制項不是。Although a control is affected by `font` attributes of the specified object, a control is not. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用並物件，衍生自，用來顯示中的資料列控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use and objects, which are derived from , to display rows in a control. 的屬性物件設定和控管如何顯示欄位包含的控制項。The property of the object is set and governs how the control contained by the field is displayed. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_2/CS/datacontrolfield2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_2/VB/datacontrolfield2vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 從目前資料表儲存格中擷取資料控制項欄位的值，並將值加入至指定的 集合。

span.span: Extracts the value of the data control field from the current table cell and adds the value to the specified collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法藉由衍生自型別將目前的欄位值，如果適用的話。The method is implemented by types derived from to associate the current field with a value, if applicable. 欄位/值組儲存在`dictionary`傳遞給方法的集合。The field/value pair is stored in the `dictionary` collection that is passed to the method. 方法會呼叫`ExtractRowValues`方法的資料控制項，例如和。The method is called by the `ExtractRowValues` method of data controls such as and . 呼叫這個方法，當您撰寫自訂資料繫結控制項使用來組合一組資料格和其關聯的值的物件。Call this method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses objects to assemble a set of cells and their associated values. 當您撰寫類別，衍生自實作這個方法顯示使用者資料繫結的資料。Implement this method when you are writing a class derived from that displays user data or data-bound data. 所有衍生型別實作方法，因為並非所有的欄位會顯示使用者的資料。Not all derived types implement the method, because not all fields display user data. 比方說，控制項顯示按鈕，並沒有任何使用者資料。For example, the control displays a button and has no user data. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作方法之衍生自控制項類別。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method for a control that derives from the class. `RadioButtonField`類別會呈現每個資料列的資料繫結選項按鈕控制項。The `RadioButtonField` class renders a data-bound radio button for every row in a control. 當呼叫方法，這個方法會嘗試判斷是否目前的值物件包含在資料格中選取或清除，並將值加入集合。When the method is called, the method attempts to determine whether the current value of the object contained in the cell is selected or cleared, and adds the value to the collection. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField/CS/radiobuttonfield.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField/VB/radiobuttonfield.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得或設定資料控制項欄位的頁尾樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style of the footer of the data control field.

value.span: ，管理 之頁尾項目的外觀。

span.span: A that governs the appearance of the footer item of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會控管的任何衍生自型別之頁尾項目中所顯示的文字外觀。The property governs the appearance of any text displayed in the footer item of a type derived from . > [!NOTE] > 某些資料繫結控制項不會呈現資料控制項欄位之頁尾項目。Some data-bound controls do not render a footer item for a data control field. 比方說，控制項顯示其資料控制項欄位的資料列。For example, the control displays its data control fields as rows. 頁尾項目不會呈現這些資料控制項欄位。A footer item is not rendered for these data control fields. 會忽略這些控制項中的屬性。The property is ignored in these controls.

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is displayed in the footer item of a data control field.

value.span: 字串，顯示在 的頁尾項目中。

span.span: A string that is displayed in the footer item of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用欄位的相關屬性，以將附註解加入至資料控制項欄位，或針對其他資料。Use the property to add notes or comments to a data control field, or for other data related to the field. > [!NOTE] > 某些資料繫結控制項不會呈現資料控制項欄位之頁尾項目。Some data-bound controls do not render a footer item for a data control field. 比方說，控制項顯示其資料控制項欄位的資料列。For example, the control displays its data control fields as rows. 頁尾項目不會呈現這些資料控制項欄位。A footer item is not rendered for these data control fields. 會忽略這些控制項中的屬性。The property is ignored in these controls. 此屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定時您想要的標頭項目，而不是標頭文字的資料控制項中顯示之影像的屬性。Set the property when you want an image displayed in the header item of a data control instead of header text. > [!NOTE] > 如果兩個並設定的屬性，屬性的優先順序。If both the and properties are set, the property has precedence. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式設定的屬性資料行，顯示中的映像控制項的資料行標頭，而不是標頭文字。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the property of a column, which displays an image in the control's column header instead of header text. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會控管中衍生之類型的標頭項目顯示任何文字的外觀。The property governs the appearance of any text displayed in the header item of a type derived from . 最常見的應用程式屬性是改變資料行中的標頭的樣式控制項。The most common application of the property is to alter the style of the column headers in a control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式設定的屬性資料行，顯示資料行標頭中的黃色背景色彩控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the property of a column, which displays a yellow background color for the column header in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來識別資料控制項中的欄位具有好記的名稱。Use the property to identify a field in a data control with a friendly name. 最常見的應用程式屬性是要提供有意義的資料行名稱中的資料繫結欄位或控制項。The most common application of the property is to provide meaningful column names for data-bound fields in a or control. > [!NOTE] > 如果兩個並設定的屬性，屬性的優先順序。If both the and properties are set, the property has precedence. 此屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式設定的屬性資料行中的資料行標頭文字顯示控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the properties of columns to display text in the column headers of a control. 此程式碼範例示範的主從式案例控制項用來顯示時的資料子集控制項用來顯示一組較大的資料，並插入新的記錄。This code example demonstrates a master-details scenario in which a control is used to display a subset of data while the control is used to display a larger set of data and insert new records. 此範例會使用兩個控制項： 一個用來填入控制項和一個用來填入控制及插入資料。The example uses two controls: one to populate the control and one to populate the control and insert data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/CS/sql15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/VB/sql15vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 執行資料控制項欄位的基本執行個體初始化。

span.span: Performs basic instance initialization for a data control field.
Always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項的物件是否與呼叫相關聯方法來加入資料列集合之前初始化欄位。The control that the object is associated with calls the method to initialize the field before it is added to a rows collection. 資料控制項，例如並呼叫方法在其`CreateChildControls`方法之前呼叫其他方法，例如`CreateRow`建立特定的資料列與資料。Data controls such as and call the method in their `CreateChildControls` methods before calling other methods such as `CreateRow` to create specific rows with data. 呼叫這個方法，當您撰寫自訂資料繫結控制項使用物件來執行基本的初始化任何物件。Call this method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses objects to perform basic initialization for any objects. 實作這個方法，如果您衍生的型別需要的任何物件初始化之前它會填入,物件的資料或控制項方法。Implement this method if your derived type requires any object initialization before it populates objects with data or controls in the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 型別衍生自實作方法，以將文字和控制項加入會使用資料表來顯示使用者介面 (UI) 的資料控制項所屬的物件。Types derived from implement the method to add text and controls to a object that belongs to a data control that uses tables to display a user interface (UI). 這些資料控制項建立完整的資料表結構列當其各自`CreateChildControls`方法受到呼叫。These data controls create the complete table structure row by row when their respective `CreateChildControls` methods are called. 方法會呼叫`InitializeRow`方法的資料控制項，例如和。The method is called by the `InitializeRow` method of data controls such as and . 呼叫這個方法，當您撰寫自訂資料繫結控制項使用物件初始化的資料或控制項的資料表結構的儲存格。Call this method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses objects to initialize the cells of the table structure with data or controls. 當您撰寫類別，衍生自實作這個方法。Implement this method when you are writing a class derived from . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作方法之衍生自控制項類別。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method for a control that derives from the class. `RadioButtonField`類別會呈現每個資料列的資料繫結選項按鈕控制項。The `RadioButtonField` class renders a data-bound radio button for every row in a control. 當資料列將資料顯示給使用者，而不是處於編輯模式，控制項已停用。When the row is displaying data to a user and is not in edit mode, the control is disabled. 當資料列處於編輯模式，例如，當使用者選擇要更新中的資料列控制項，為已啟用，以便可以按一下要呈現控制項。When the row is in edit mode, for example when the user chooses to update a row in the control, the control is rendered as enabled so that it can be clicked. 這個範例會使用位元 AND 運算子，因為資料列的狀態可能是一或多個組合值。This example uses bitwise AND operators, because the row state might be a combination of one or more values. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField/CS/radiobuttonfield.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField/VB/radiobuttonfield.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會控管的任何文字所顯示的資料型別衍生自外觀。The property governs the appearance of any text data displayed by a type derived from . 例如，當您繫結控制文字資料，您可以使用改變顯示的文字外觀的屬性。For example, when you bind a control to text data, you can use the property to alter the appearance of the text that is displayed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式設定上的屬性用來顯示物件`FirstName`並`LastName`中的資料控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the property on the objects used to display `FirstName` and `LastName` data in a control. 控制項有屬性設定為`false`，可顯示所傳回的資料子集屬性。The control has the property set to `false`, which enables it to display a subset of the data returned by the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_1/CS/datacontrolfield1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_1/VB/datacontrolfield1vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 將資料來源檢視還原成之前所儲存的檢視狀態。

span.span: Restores the data source view's previously saved view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定的自訂伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)). 這個方法會還原檢視狀態資訊物件所儲存的先前頁面要求方法。This method restores view-state information for the object from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

protected: virtual void OnFieldChanged();

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會引發事件，表示物件的狀態已經變更。The method raises an event signaling that the object's state has changed. 變更下列屬性會導致引發此事件： ， ， ， ， ，和。Changes to the following properties cause this event to be raised: , , , , , and . 在衍生的類型屬性也會引發這個事件發生狀態變更時。Derived type properties also raise this event when state changes occur. 例如 web 伺服器控制項並通常會呼叫`DataBind`方法以回應欄位變更事件。Web server controls such as and typically call the `DataBind` method in response to a field change event. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 儲存自頁面回傳至伺服器以來對 檢視狀態所做的變更。

span.span: Saves the changes made to the view state since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含 檢視狀態變更的物件。

span.span: The object that contains the changes to the view state.

returns.span: 如果沒有與物件關聯的檢視狀態，則這個方法會傳回 。

span.span: If there is no view state associated with the object, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。This method is used primarily by control developers. 檢視狀態是伺服器控制項的屬性值的累積。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 這些值會自動放在伺服器控制項的屬性，這是執行個體的類別。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 儲存狀態的伺服器控制項生命週期的階段之後，這個屬性的值然後會保存到字串物件。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle. 儲存檢視狀態時，則會傳回字串給用戶端會儲存在 HTML 中的變數`hidden`項目。When view state is saved, a string is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML `hidden` element. 當您撰寫自訂伺服器控制項時，您可以透過覆寫這個方法，並修改您的伺服器控制項來改善效率屬性。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 檢視狀態概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/19d2a6ed-9a77-4c7c-a7f5-74dd4b6c3818)。For more information, see [ASP.NET View State Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/19d2a6ed-9a77-4c7c-a7f5-74dd4b6c3818).

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，表示欄位所包含的控制項支援回呼 (Callback)。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, signals that the controls contained by a field support callbacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是用來判斷控制項是否包含在 helper 方法物件支援回呼。The method is a helper method used to determine whether the controls contained in a object support callbacks. 已實作的基底實作，這個方法會擲回例外狀況來指出不支援回呼。The base implementation of this method has been implemented to throw a exception to indicate that callbacks are not supported. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。This method is used primarily by control developers.

exception.span: 會在 類別的預設執行個體上呼叫這個方法。

span.span: The method is called on a default instance of the class.

para.span: 衍生自類別類別可以覆寫這個方法，以指出控制項是否包含欄位支援回呼。

span.span: Classes that derive from the class can override this method to indicate whether the controls contained by the field support callbacks.

para.span: 若要指出支援回呼，此方法實作為空方法不會擲回例外狀況，使用描述為什麼不支援回呼的有用訊息，否則擲回例外狀況。

span.span: To indicate that callbacks are supported, implement this method as an empty method that does not throw an exception; otherwise, throw an exception with a useful message describing why callbacks are not supported.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得狀態資訊的字典，允許您在相同頁面的多個要求之間，儲存和還原 物件的檢視狀態。

span.span: Gets a dictionary of state information that allows you to save and restore the view state of a object across multiple requests for the same page.

value.span: 的執行個體，包含 檢視狀態資訊。

span.span: An instance of that contains the view-state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料控制項欄位的檢視狀態是累積的所有屬性值。A data control field's view state is the accumulation of all its property values. 若要保留這些值的 HTTP 要求之間，ASP.NET 伺服器控制項使用這個屬性，這是執行個體的類別，來儲存屬性值。To preserve these values across HTTP requests, ASP.NET server controls use this property, which is an instance of the class, to store the property values. 值會接著為變數時傳遞至 HTML 隱藏 input 元素，會處理後續要求。The values are then passed as a variable to an HTML hidden input element when subsequent requests are processed. 如需儲存伺服器控制項檢視狀態的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 檢視狀態概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/19d2a6ed-9a77-4c7c-a7f5-74dd4b6c3818)。For more information about saving server control view state, see [ASP.NET View State Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/19d2a6ed-9a77-4c7c-a7f5-74dd4b6c3818). 檢視狀態，會根據預設，啟用對所有伺服器控制項，但有些情況時您會想要停用它。View state is enabled for all server controls by default, but there are circumstances when you will want to disable it. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 效能概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f882bf1b-a009-4312-ac06-74370ffabc0b)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Performance Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f882bf1b-a009-4312-ac06-74370ffabc0b). 如需字典和使用方式的詳細資訊，請參閱[集合和資料結構](~/docs/standard/collections/index.md)。For more information about dictionaries and how to use them, see [Collections and Data Structures](~/docs/standard/collections/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以顯示或隱藏資料繫結控制項中的物件。Use the property to show or hide objects in a data-bound control. 如果屬性是`false`，不會顯示資料值，並執行用戶端進行往返。If the property is `false`, the data values are not displayed and do not make a round-trip to the client. 如果您想要反覆存取資料的欄位，看不到，新增的欄位名稱`DataKeyNames`資料繫結控制項的屬性。If you want to round-trip the data for a field that is not visible, add the field name to the `DataKeyNames` property of the data-bound control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用並物件，衍生自，用來顯示中的資料列控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use and objects, which are derived from , to display rows in a control. 的屬性物件，會顯示`EmployeeID`資料行會設定為`false`，和資料行不會呈現所控制項。The property of the object that displays the `EmployeeID` column is set to `false`, and the column is not rendered by the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_2/CS/datacontrolfield2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_2/VB/datacontrolfield2vb.aspx#1)]
